name: dropbox-001-allow-domains
description: Allow Dropbox to connect to its own domains for core functionality: file sync (dropbox.com, client.dropbox.com, d.dropbox.com), API calls (api.dropbox.com), DNS resolution (*.dropbox-dns.com), static content and updates (*.dropboxstatic.com, dl-debug.dropbox.com). All subdomains are included via wildcard regex. Covers both the user-installed binary (~/.dropbox-dist/) and system-installed binary (/opt/dropbox/).
